titleStmt.title: The character of a London diurnall.
titleStmt.author: Cleveland, John, 1613-1658.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from Wing.
Wing has publication year 1644[/5]; Thomason catalogue lists under 1645.

In this edition there is a title page border and page 5 begins "First, Stamford slew". "There is a London reprint, with no border round title and pp. [2] + 6 only (p. 5 beg. 'Gold that glisters') which is made from the 2nd Oxford edition"--Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
